attributes.contentHtml:
You can post this:

Hi there,

I am one of the administrators over at Vertisan Pro.

It's come to our attention that you have opened a misleading post on this website. You were banned from using our services for breaking our rules and guidelines. We will further elaborate the reason below.

Reason for termination

  • You were initially kicked for disrespecting our staff members in dms by calling them a "kid".

After this kick, our system detected you were sharing/leaking the license with one of your friends and leaking our service to other users. We did a background check, and indeed it turns out it was using your license.
His Panel: https://game.shieldcore.eu/
Discord: AntonioVbn#7699
Drama.gg: comments above

Your kick was turned into a ban. You proceeded followed by Ddossing our services for which you are now banned permanently. You are not welcome to use any of our services in the future ever again.

We are currently doing an investigation and breaking copyright laws. It's clear to us that you are using alt accounts to send us DDoss threats and are using alt account on this post.

Our service has more than 3000 clients, we always work towards bettering the experience of our clients and making new updates. We always think rationally, we do not ban users out of thin air, there is always good reasoning behind it.

PadowYT2 You were initially kicked for disrespecting our staff members in dms by calling them a "kid".

ngl, that's a stupid reason for kicking someone but they sure do deserve it
PadowYT2 That staff member must be pretty sensitive and immature then.
